headline: Meet the Dow Jones Dividend Stock That's on Pace to Beat the S&P 500 for the Fifth Consecutive Year. Here's Why It's Still a Buy Now.
summary: American Express has competitive advantages that are built to last, making it an ideal dividend stock to buy and hold.

headline: A Fresh Look at Mastercard (MA) Valuation Following Major NFC Tap-to-Pay Expansion with Kakao Pay
summary: Mastercard (MA) is back in the spotlight after a big announcement hit the wires: Kakao Pay, a top mobile wallet in South Korea, just launched NFC-based “tap-to-pay” for overseas transactions. This rolls out through a partnership with Mastercard and Alipay+, opening up tap payments at over 150 million Mastercard-accepting merchants worldwide for Kakao Pay users. It is a move that reflects the surging demand for secure, convenient international payments, and could shape the way travelers and...
